Question: iRomaScents A.B. Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
iRomaScents A.B. Ltd

CES 2024

- iRomaScents Digital Scent Generator adds a new sensory dimension to cinema, shopping, and home media

- Offers cinema goers a new dimension in entertainment, brings scents to stores and malls, and allows enjoying scents with TV, movies, and video games in the home

- Releases a tightly directed dose of scent on demand or in sync with a movie/video

- ScentTrack™ simplifies adding scent to video with a click of a mouse

- Expected to launch as a fully viable product during 2022, with patents pending

- Partnerships with fragrance, marketing, industrial design, and filmmaking executives

- Device loaded with up to 45 fragrances, can store over 5,000 "whiffs"

- Can be "pencil-beamed" to reach specific viewers

- Third time exhibitor at CES, returning with innovative scent technology

iRomaScents A.B.有限公司

CES 2024

- iRomaScents数字香氛生成器为电影院、购物和家居媒体增加了一个新的感官维度

- 为观影人提供了娱乐的新维度，为商店和购物中心带来了香味，允许在家中享受电视、电影和视频游戏的香味

- 提供按需或与电影/视频同步释放浓度可控的香味

- ScentTrack™通过鼠标点击简化了给视频添加香味的步骤

- 预计在2022年发布成为一个完全可行的产品，正在申请专利

- 与香水、市场营销、工业设计和电影制作高管建立合作伙伴关系

- 设备可装载45种香味，可存储超过5,000次“嗅觉”

- 可以通过“铅笔射束”技术定向传递给特定观众

- 第三次参加CES展览会，带着创新的香氛技术回归
